sentence.Network_en: John found himself surrounded by insincere flattery.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰发现自己为虚情假意的奉承阿谀所包围。
西尔维娅的微笑很做作.

sentence.Network_en: He is above the insincere flattery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对这种假惺惺的谄谀不屑一顾.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE笔记--7.20&nbsp;Verbal_松松_新浪博客 ... farce 闹剧 insincere 无诚意，不诚实的 constant 常素.
《综合英语二》整理资料[旺旺英语论坛] ... nightmare n. 噩梦；可怕的事情 insincere adj. 不真诚的 hesitancy n. 犹豫不决，踌躇.
描述性格的词汇有哪些？ - 精华知识 - 搜搜问问 ... (insensitive 感觉迟钝的) (insincere 虚假的) (irrational 无理性的).
gre考试句子填空常见词汇... ... scarcely ad. 简直不,一定不,仅仅 insincere a. 不诚实的,无诚意的,伪善的 evince vt. 表明,表示.

list.abs: a charming but thoroughly insincere woman ; their praise was extravagant and insincere ., 一个迷人但十分虚假的女人 ; 他们的吹捧过分而虚假.
Flattering in an insincere way ; obsequious ., 以不真诚的方式奉承的;

I was thinking that Victor had been to see Lily Lilac on every occasion that the Headmaster would allow . she was fairhaired and fine boneda breezy , insincere manner I found exasperating .我想起只要校长允许，维克托一有机会就去见莉丽。莱勒克。她有着漂亮的头发和身材，还有另我讨厌的傲慢和虚伪的态度。
Under some circumstances . we always habitually insincerely ., 在一些情况下 . 我们总是习惯性地言不由衷.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin insincerus, from in- 'not' + sincerus 'sincere'

entry.def: If you say that someone is insincere, you are being critical of them because they say things they do not really mean, usually pleasant, admiring, or encouraging things.

example.ex: Some people are so terribly insincere you can never tell if they are telling the truth...
example.tran: 有些人非常虚伪,你根本说不准他们是否在讲实话。

example.ex: John found himself surrounded by insincere flattery.
example.tran: 约翰发现自己为虚情假意的奉承阿谀所包围。

auth_sentence.content: A reaction against excessive and often insincere adulation.

auth_sentence.content: But the meant-as-heartfelt material often feels insincere and out of place.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the meant-as-heartfelt material often feels insincere and out of place.

auth_sentence.content: So how can you tell if a job posting is insincere?
